text: Nicolás Agustín Ferreyra (born March 30, 1993 in Río Cuarto (Córdoba), Argentina) is an Argentine footballer currently playing for Belgrano de Córdoba of the Superliga Argentina. == Teams == * Belgrano de Córdoba 2012–present * San Marcos de Arica 2015 (loan) * Audax Italiano 2017 (loan) == References == * Profile at BDFA * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Club Atlético Belgrano footballers Category:San Marcos de Arica footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Nicolás Ferreyra
